name: Shop'n'Demic
description:
SHOP'n'DEMIC

It happened again! A global pandemic has broken out and people are supposed to stay indoors. But who is going to do your shopping for you? That's right nobody. So you have to go to the store and get all the stuff you need in a time like this.

However, even though you might not know it you already carry the virus, so as a responsible human being you don't want to infect anybody else. Because even though the virus might not be harmful to you, it might be to others.

So go shop responsibly.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use your mouse to move around.

CREDITS:

A game by @AndideBob

Graphics by @ToastiChron

Music by @DJBBone
